sources.title: Killing Time (1998) Life is a bitch and her name is Maria.... 4K
sources.description:
Detective Robert Bryant (Craig Fairbrass) enlists the help of a skilled professional (Kendra Torgan) to settle a personal score, but when things go sideways, he makes a risky move that backfires spectacularly. As tensions escalate, Bryant realizes he‚Äôs in over his head, and the tables turn in a dangerous game of strategy and survival.

Original title: Killing Time (1998)

Director: Bharat Nalluri
Writers: Caspar Berry, Fleur Costello, Neil Marshall
Cast: Craig Fairbrass, Nigel Leach, Kendra Torgan
Genres: Action, Crime, Thriller
Release date: January 30, 1998

metadata.Plot: After the mobster who murdered his partner is acquitted, semicorrupt detective Robert Bryant hires a beautiful female assassin, Maria, to kill him. When he discovers that he cannot afford Maria's services, Bryant is forced to hire another assassin, Madison, to kill her. Maria survives the doublecross and sets out to collect what's owed to her, one way or another.
metadata.Writer: Caspar Berry, Fleur Costello, Neil Marshall
metadata.Actors: Craig Fairbrass, Nigel Leach, Kendra Torgan
